allow: Bash(python3 -c " import json,sys d = json.load\(sys.stdin\) if ''data'' in d: u = d[''data''][''user''] print\(f'' User: {u[""nome""]}''\) print\(f'' Role: {u[""role""]}''\) print\(f'' XP: {u[""xp""]}''\) print\(f'' Access token: {d[""data""][""accessToken""][:40]}...''\) print\(f'' Refresh token: {d[""data""][""refreshToken""][:20]}...''\) else: print\('' Error:'', d\) ")
Bash(# Find actual stdout from server 12748 wmic process where ""ProcessId=12748"" get CommandLine)
Bash(powershell -Command "Stop-Process -Id 3620 -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Start-Sleep 2; Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 3001 -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Format-Table")
Bash(cmd /c "for /f ""tokens=5"" %a in \(''netstat -aon ^| findstr :3001 ^| findstr LISTENING''\) do taskkill /F /PID %a")
Bash(cmd /c "for /f ""tokens=5"" %a in \(''netstat -aon 2^>nul ^| findstr :3000 ^| findstr LISTENING''\) do @echo PID:%a && taskkill /F /PID %a")
